results.content: It shows some examples of lodash, but for me was a bit monotonous.
results.content_html: It shows some examples of lodash, but for me was a bit monotonous.

results.content: So far every installation step has been pretty straightforward and free of issues.
results.content_html: So far every installation step has been pretty straightforward and free of issues.

results.content: I signed on for this course hoping to learn more about lodash, and currently have only gone through the first couple of videos where they actually dive into the code. Rather disappointed that each lodash function is given like a 10-15 sec treatment and out of a 10 min video, which spends time talking about css, adding elements to the DOM etc, all which I am not interested in. I want to know why I need to use create, what reduce actually does for example, but I just see that statement in 1 line of the code and 1 sentence explanation that reduce does this..... Have no idea how to use it in my own application after watching it. It would be more helpful to go through the data structure, give examples of how reduce would work with the data structure etc. Don't need to talk about the server side and client side, just pick 1 side and illustrate in greater detail with the object structure what each function does in relation to the data structure.

results.content: This course seems to be missing steps, or skips right over them. This course is difficult to follow with missing steps and files that do not download from the git repository.
